title: [Large-scale] Virtual Microscope-Based Histology Learning Design: Simulation Training for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and proficiency in microscope usage
context.additional_context: Aims for digital transformation of histology education for pre-service and in-service teachers, providing personalized feedback through learning behavior data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify 80% or more tissue sample slides using a virtual microscope (Cytomine®).
Learners can assess their learning efficiency using at least three metrics through learning behavior data analysis.
Learners can describe 10 key histology slides (selected via predictive algorithms) with 85% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
